replies.body:
I always pick a squishy when i want to play tank so someone else will pick a tank then i pick one anyway lol

Mindgaming your own team to get the teamcomp you want is so brilliant
That's why I just main Gnar. He can be anything.

you need to try full attack speed jungle gnar. i kind you not its so funny. if you time your ganks right so that there is always a scuttle near the lane you can get your fury up and then get that nice mega e then w q wait till they flash and then ult them back in. people rage at it becuase they say it shouldnt work but it does and oh is it hilarius
must say i have tried this before and someone ragequit
lol you need to get some early kills to start the snowball.
I used to play Sated Gnar until Sated was nerfed for ranged. It's pretty great.
Try Sated AP Gnar.... 100% AP ratio on your W, and you get that on every other auto attack. It's legendary.
no not anymore lol rip gnar jungle 2015. just imagine a 600 ap gnar with nashors tooth hurricane and sated devourer. jsut 1 v 3ing like a pro
Oh yeah I forgot they changed the ranged to 3 hits... and the guy I replied to even said that... I'm just gonna let myself out, like I let myself down earlier.
Jayce can do it better. Top, Mid, Jungle, 2k crit ADC, speedgate support Jayce, you name it. Jayce does it all.
Tbh I mostly meant he could build anything and succeed (build like a Marksman, Tank, Fighter; go AD, AS, AP, whatever).
AP Jayce is a hypercarry bro

too bad in bronze everyone picks a squishy damage carry no matter what
Genious
It's nice to see people having fun without malicious intent. +1
B..But...
https://media.licdn.com/mpr/mpr/p/6/005/06f/38e/349beb3.jpg
actually this is a solo player matched with a 4-man. he actually wanted to play nunu jungle. they then banned nunu and laughed at him. =(
What was also really funny was the fact that none of us were premade, all solo players sharing a nice joke (without even having to type anything in the chat).
Had a team do this with me when I picked Gnar. All but one of us, cause the one guy didn't own Gnar.

That's awesome.

Unfortunately, the guy picked Cho'hath. Not Leona.
"Report this Gnar, was in Mega form all game."
oh my gosh this made my day!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}  i need to make 300 different accounts so i can upvote this more than once.
I needed this! Some of you just really get my humor :D
hehe camooflougee
I actually used to love playing gnar adc. the dueling potential is crazy in botlane, and as long as you can blow mega before fight so you won't get any rage you're good.
Nunununununununununu
BATMAN.
Had that with EZ. It was great until the supp decided he was actually going to support with ez and took the champ i intended to play.
Try doin all Tarics or Yoricks Then I'll be impressed ;P

Taric top 

We need more
I had a sudden urge to play taric top yesterday... but I was last pick and the enemy team's 4th pick took him as a support so I was sad XD
D: JUST DO ET!!DONT LET YOUR DREAMS BE DREAMS!!!
JUST DO IT! DONT LET YOUR MEMES BE MEMES.  YESTERDAY YOU SAID TODAY SO TOMORROW! JUST DO IT UUUUGGHGHGHGH

eue fight me 1v1 bruh
we shall have the meme war....jkjk i suck at memes

Tbh Taric top is annoying AF ;-;
If he gets a good lead say bye bye to your team because nobody will be able to kill Taric, and he will just smash his hammer into your face and IT WILL HURT!

you want to see annoying, try taric jung. max w for spammy jungle clear spell/armor reduction, and abuse the mana regen on the jungle item to feed your q for sustain. in ganks, you can walk into lane, and stun, then pop your w. maybe throw a taric smash in there if needed. if you weave in autos to proc his passive you can even get multiple stuns in one fight.
How about no ;-;
This is something unusual for you? Literally anytime I see someone play teemo, I put him as my pick intent, and the whole team follows along. We don't usually have summoner spell sync though.

How many champions are there that can legitimately be in every role? {{champion:10}} is one that I know, and I guess {{champion:85}} in a weird way? And I mean... In such a way that putting them in that role is viable and playing the champion roughly as intended.
{{champion:83}}
{{champion:412}}
Thresh jungle doesn't work your clear times are horrible... (note: have not tried in season 6)
